attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Rottweilers are not dangerous dogs, it is unfortunate that children are hurt but it is not the fault of the dog. If the owner has badly treated the dog, one day it will snap. To prevent this, untrustworthy owners should be banned, not the dogs. Thank you for signing.

reasons: Wording that needs to be amended, or is impossible to understand
